tool_description: The Scraping API enables developers to extract data from HTML and XML documents of websites using various methods, such as XPath or CSS selectors. It provides a convenient way to retrieve specific data points, such as text, images, links, or other elements from web pages.
name: Scraping Data From Web by thichthicode
title: Scraping Data From Web by thichthicode
tool_name: Scraping Data From Web by thichthicode
